segments.text: Room Service . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is Room 603 . I'm afraid that the heating system doesn't work . It's very cold here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you switched on the radiator ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I have switched it on for a long time . The room is still very cold .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We're terribly sorry for that . We'll send our staff io fix it now . Or do you want to change your room ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I prefer not to move first .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . Is it convenient for us to come now ?
segments.speaker: S1
